alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 3:43AM MST until February 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches are expected in the mountains above 5,000 feet with 1 to 2 inches elevations below 5,000 feet. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley and Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet as well as the Chiricahua, Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
